business.name: Sit & Git Portables
business.tagline: Portable restroom rentals and weekly service across southwest Wisconsin.
business.service_radius_statement: Sit & Git Portables proudly serves customers throughout the Driftless Area.

services.name: Portable Restrooms
services.short: Clean, standard units for events, farms, and job sites with dependable weekly service.

image.note: Replace with a real product photo. Ideal size 900x700, under 250KB.

bullets: Delivered level and ready to use with a stocked dispenser
Weekly servicing, pumping, and restocking options
Flexible placements for tight sites or backyard access

faqs.q: What is included with a standard portable restroom?
faqs.a: Each unit includes a locking door, seat, urinal, hand sanitizer, and a stocked paper holder.

faqs.q: Can you deliver to rural or gravel access?
faqs.a: Yes. We regularly deliver to rural driveways and farm lanes as long as the truck has safe access.

services.name: ADA / Wheelchair-Accessible Units
services.short: Spacious, accessible units with handrails and ground-level entry for inclusive events and compliance.

image.note: Replace with a real product photo. Ideal size 900x700, under 250KB.

bullets: Oversized interior with wide entry and grab bars
Placed close to entrances with level footing
Ideal for festivals, public events, and worksites

faqs.q: How many ADA units do I need?
faqs.a: It depends on attendance and event type. We can recommend a mix based on your crowd and layout.

faqs.q: Are ADA units serviced on the same schedule?
faqs.a: Yes. They can be serviced weekly or on a custom schedule just like standard units.

services.name: Handwashing Stations
services.short: Standalone stations with fresh water, soap, and paper towels for better hygiene on site.

image.note: Replace with a real product photo. Ideal size 900x700, under 250KB.

bullets: Great for food service, schools, and public events

faqs.q: Do the stations include soap and towels?
faqs.a: Yes. We stock soap and paper towels and replenish during service visits.

faqs.q: Can I rent a station without restrooms?
faqs.a: Yes. We can provide standalone handwashing units for short-term or seasonal needs.

services.name: Event Rentals
services.short: Short-term rentals for weddings, festivals, reunions, and outdoor gatherings.

image.note: Replace with a real event photo. Ideal size 900x700, under 250KB.

bullets: Delivery timing coordinated with event setup
Advice on unit counts and placement
Optional mid-event servicing for multi-day events

faqs.q: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.a: A few weeks is best for popular weekends, but we can often accommodate last-minute needs.

faqs.q: Do you handle pickup after the event?
faqs.a: Yes. We schedule pickup based on your teardown timeline and site access.

services.name: Construction / Long-Term Rentals
services.short: Reliable, consistent service for job sites and long-term placements.

image.note: Replace with a real jobsite photo. Ideal size 900x700, under 250KB.

bullets: Regular weekly service with clear scheduling
Flexible placement as the site changes

faqs.a: Yes. We can increase or decrease service based on crew size and use.
We offer simple, transparent pricing for ongoing rentals. Ask for a quote based on duration.

global_faq.a: Most deliveries can be scheduled within a few business days. For peak weekends, earlier requests get priority.
Weekly service is standard, but we can adjust based on volume, event size, or site requirements.
Yes. We offer ADA-compliant units with accessible entry and interior space.

global_faq.q: What do you need to provide a quote?
global_faq.a: We ask for the address, dates, unit type, quantity, and any site notes like access or terrain.

testimonials.name: Megan R.
testimonials.text: Clear communication from delivery to pickup. The units were clean, and the schedule was exactly as promised.

intro.title: Simple rentals with clear expectations
intro.body: We deliver standard, ADA, and handwashing units with consistent servicing and easy communication. Whether you need a short-term event rental or a long-term placement, we keep it tidy and on schedule.

service_teaser.title: Services built for real sites
service_teaser.body: Choose the right mix of units for your event, farm, or job site. We help you plan quantities and placement.

reviews.title: Recent customer feedback
reviews.body: Replace this block with your preferred reviews widget or a short list of reviews.
reviews.note: Recommended: 3 to 5 short reviews, each 1 to 2 sentences.

why_choose.title: Why choose Sit & Git Portables?
why_choose.body: Clean units and responsive local service you can reach by phone or text.
items: Sit & Git Portables provides high-quality, ultra-clean portable toilets and sinks. Our user-friendly equipment is the best you can find in the area.
We deliver reliable equipment and consistent, high-quality service, ensuring a smooth and professional experience with every rental.
We are proud to be a locally-owned business that responds quickly to meet the needs of our neighbors in the Driftless Area

service_area.title: Our Service Area
service_area.body: Sit & Git Portables is based in southwest Wisconsin and serves customers throughout the Driftless Area. We cover nearby towns and rural sites across Richland, Vernon, and Crawford counties. If you are unsure about coverage, call or text and we will confirm service for your address.

services.title: Portable restroom rental services
services.intro: From backyard gatherings to multi-month builds, our rental options are designed around reliable delivery and consistent service.

cta.title: Not sure what you need?
cta.body: Tell us a few details and we will recommend the right mix of units.

cta.title: Ready to schedule delivery?
cta.body: We will confirm placement, timing, and service frequency before we deliver.

service_area.title: Service area for portable restroom rentals
service_area.intro: We serve the Driftless Area with regular routes and flexible delivery windows. Typical coverage is 30 to 40 miles depending on the order.

cta.title: Planning an event or job site?
cta.body: We can help confirm placement, timing, and the right mix of units.

county.intro: We deliver and service portable restrooms throughout {county} for events, construction, and seasonal needs.
county.uses: Common requests include weddings, community festivals, and long-term construction job sites.

cta.title: Need units in this area?
cta.body: We will confirm delivery timing and access details before we arrive.

sentence_variants: We provide dependable delivery and weekly service throughout {town} and the surrounding areas of {county}.
From weekend gatherings to long-running projects, we keep schedules clear and units clean in {town}.
Our routes through {county} make it easy to serve {town} with predictable, on-time service.
town.extra_sentence: We coordinate delivery timing around site access and confirm placement before we arrive.

cta.title: Need delivery in {town}?
cta.body: Tell us your dates and site location, and we will confirm the right setup.

faq.title: Portable restroom rental FAQ
faq.intro: Answers to the most common rental questions, delivery details, and service expectations.

about.title: About Sit & Git Portables
about.body: We are a local, owner-operated portable restroom company serving southwest Wisconsin. Our focus is clean units, dependable routes, and clear communication so you know what to expect from delivery through pickup.

contact.title: Contact Sit & Git Portables
contact.body: Reach out for availability, scheduling questions, or a fast quote. We reply by call or text as quickly as possible.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.body: Share a few details and we will follow up with availability and pricing.

quote.title: Get a quote
quote.intro: Tell us about your site and dates. We will confirm the right unit mix and follow up by phone or text.
quote.success: Thanks for the details. We will call or text shortly to confirm the next steps.
